com.charlie.Graphics.math3DUtils

Class ViewportMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.charlie.Graphics.math3DUtils.Matrix
      • com.charlie.Graphics.math3DUtils.ViewportMatrix

  • public class ViewportMatrix
extends Matrix

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ViewportMatrix(double width, double height)
      generates a viewport matrix for a windows of of widthxheight, this assumes minz and maxz and 0 and 1 respectively.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class com.charlie.Graphics.math3DUtils.Matrix

        equals, getColumns, getColumnVector, getRows, getRowVector, getValue, hashCode, multiply, setToIdentity, setValue, toString

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        getClass, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ViewportMatrix

        public ViewportMatrix(double width,
              double height)
        generates a viewport matrix for a windows of of widthxheight, this assumes minz and maxz and 0 and 1 respectively. this does not move the vertexes as we are going to assume the viewport fills the whole window in this case
        Parameters:
        width - the width of the window
        height - the height of the window
